programme.title: Let No Man Write My Epitaph
programme.desc: Nick Romano (James Darren) lives in a poor tenement building on the south side of Chicago with his well-meaning but drug-addicted mother, Nellie (Shelley Winters). She encourages him to pursue his piano-playing talent in hopes that it will bring him a better life. Nellie's neighbors, like the alcoholic ex-lawyer (Burl Ives) who secretly loves her, help her in keeping Nick away from Louie, the resident drug dealer. But a chance meeting between Nick and Louie could change things forever.

programme.title: The Heroes of Telemark
programme.desc: In German-occupied Norway in 1942, a resistance group attempts to sabotage the Nazi's production of essential atomic bomb components.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: Reporter Ben Munceford (Sidney Poitier) is aboard a U.S. Navy ship sailing near the Arctic Circle, on assignment to write a profile of Capt. Eric Finlander (Richard Widmark), a hardened anti-communist. Despite the concerns of Munceford, medical officer Chester Potter (Martin Balsam) and others on the ship, Finlander is shadowing a Soviet submarine on patrol in the same area, hoping to make it to surface. The cat-and-mouse game, however, turns deadly serious.

programme.title: Miss Sadie Thompson
programme.desc: In postwar Honolulu, a former sex worker finds herself courted by a love-struck Marine as a religious zealot sets his sights on reforming her.

programme.title: You Were Never Lovelier
programme.desc: Bob Davis (Fred Astaire), an American dancer in Buenos Aires, Argentina, finds himself desperate for work after losing all his money. He takes a gig at a wedding, hoping to impress the bride's father, Eduardo Acuña (Adolphe Menjou), a local club owner who has decreed that his daughters must marry in order of age. Eduardo eventually agrees to allow Bob to perform at his club, but only under the condition that he play suitor to his second-oldest daughter, the beautiful Maria (Rita Hayworth).

programme.title: Hook, Line and Sinker
programme.desc: Diagnosed with a terminal illness, Peter decides to go out with a bang— racking up $100,000 in credit card debt—only to find he's not dying after all.

programme.title: On the Waterfront
programme.desc: Dockworker Terry Malloy (Marlon Brando) had been an up-and-coming boxer until powerful local mob boss Johnny Friendly (Lee J. Cobb) persuaded him to throw a fight. When a longshoreman is murdered before he can testify about Friendly's control of the Hoboken waterfront, Terry teams up with the dead man's sister Edie (Eva Marie Saint) and the streetwise priest Father Barry (Karl Malden) to testify himself, against the advice of Friendly's lawyer, Terry's older brother Charley (Rod Steiger).

programme.title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
programme.desc: When the idealistic young Jefferson Smith (James Stewart) winds up appointed to the United States Senate, he gains the mentorship of Senator Joseph Paine (Claude Rains). However, Paine isn't as noble as his reputation would indicate, and he becomes involved in a scheme to discredit Smith, who wants to build a boys' campsite where a more lucrative project could go. Determined to stand up against Paine and his corrupt peers, Smith takes his case to the Senate floor.

programme.title: Autumn Leaves
programme.desc: An aging, lonely spinster marries a good-looking younger man only to find that he has a very tormented past and is mentally disturbed.

programme.title: The Taming of the Shrew
programme.desc: A rich merchant's beautiful daughter and her volatile older sister are courted by rival suitors in this rambunctious version of Shakespeare's comedy.

programme.title: Convicted
programme.desc: During a barroom brawl, Joe Hufford (Glenn Ford) accidentally kills the son of a powerful, prominent man. The district attorney, George Knowland (Broderick Crawford), wins a manslaughter conviction, despite having doubts about the defendant's guilt. Joe is sent to prison, and George, who eventually becomes the warden there, hopes to get him released. But Joe gets so immersed in the culture and codes of the jailhouse that he finds it difficult to believe in his own innocence.

programme.title: Born Free
programme.desc: An English couple in Kenya raises an orphaned lion cub to adulthood. When a warden demands she be sent to a zoo, they train her to live in the wild.

programme.title: Our Wife
programme.desc: A composer (Melvyn Douglas) goes on a cruise and meets a woman (Ruth Hussey) he likes more than his wife (Ellen Drew).

programme.title: The Three Stooges in Orbit
programme.desc: When a pair of Martians steal a powerful submarine-tank-rocket military weapon from an inventor, the Three Stooges step in to try to save the day.

programme.title: The Magic Carpet
programme.desc: When his parents, the caliph and queen, are murdered by usurper Ali (Gregory Gaye), the newborn Ramoth is delivered to the safety of his uncle, Ahkmid (William Fawcett), via a magic carpet. The adult Ramoth (John Agar) becomes masked hero the Scarlet Falcon. After tricking the reigning caliph into appointing him the royal physician, Ramoth learns of his noble birth and, with the help of faithful Razi (George Tobias) and beautiful Lida (Patricia Medina), he fights Ali and his wrathful minions.

programme.title: The Fuller Brush Man
programme.desc: Clumsy sanitation worker Red Jones (Red Skelton) is fired from his street-cleaning job shortly after his girlfriend, Ann Elliot (Janet Blair), refuses his marriage proposal until he betters himself. While training to become a door-to-door salesman, he accidentally stumbles into a murder investigation when the corrupt sanitation commissioner (Nicholas Joy) who had fired him is killed. When the murder weapon is found to be one of the brushes Red sells, he must fight to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Divorce American Style
programme.desc: A nouveau-riche L.A. couple decide to call it quits after 17 years of marriage, but alimony woes send the bachelor in search of a husband for his ex.

programme.title: Scalplock
programme.desc: A frontier gambler (Dale Robertson) wins a railroad in a card game and has to keep it going as people try to take it away from him.

programme.title: Santa Fe
programme.desc: Three brothers become outlaws after the Civil War, while a fourth sibling goes to work for the railroad.

programme.title: Hangman's Knot
programme.desc: Major Matt Stewart (Randolph Scott) leads a troop of Confederate soldiers on a raid, targeting a wagon that is transporting Union gold. All of the Union soldiers are killed except for one, who informs Stewart that the war had already ended a month ago. Stewart leads the troop into hiding, knowing they could face murder charges. After capturing a coach driven by nurse Molly Hull (Donna Reed), the soldiers try to evade a group of bandits chasing them to steal the gold.

programme.title: 7th Cavalry
programme.desc: Returning to Fort Lincoln, Capt. Benson learns of Custer's defeat at the Little Big Horn. At the inquiry as Custer's officers blame Custer for the defeat, Benson tries to defend him. However, Benson was suspiciously absent at the time of the battle and is now despised by the troops. So when an order to retrieve the bodies from the battlefield arrives, Benson volunteers for the dangerous mission of returning back into Indian territory.

programme.title: Masterson of Kansas
programme.desc: In the 1870s, Marshal Wyatt Earp (Bruce Cowling) calls upon Dodge City, Kan., Sheriff Bat Masterson (George Montgomery) to track down rancher Merrick (John Maxwell), who is accused of murder. But, thanks to some proof held by local Native American Chief Yellow Hawk (Jay Silverheels), Masterson realizes Merrick might be the victim of a frame-up. So, with the help of Earp and gunfighter Doc Holliday (James Griffith), Masterson sets out to find those who are really behind the killing.

programme.title: California Conquest
programme.desc: A Spanish swashbuckler (Cornel Wilde) and a gunsmith's daughter (Teresa Wright) oppose a Russian plot to annex California.

programme.title: Reprisal!
programme.desc: Frank Madden (Guy Madison), who is part Native American but passes as white, purchases a ranch in the small town of Kendall, Okla. When Frank moves in, he finds that the bigoted townspeople have recently let three brothers, who are also his neighbors, get away with the lynching murder of innocent Native Americans. As tensions between the townspeople and local Native Americans rise, Hank becomes torn between fighting against injustice and keeping his true identity a secret.

programme.title: 40 Guns to Apache Pass
programme.desc: A cavalry captain (Audie Murphy) rescues settlers and catches a corporal (Kenneth Tobey) selling rifles to Apaches.

programme.title: The Gun That Won the West
programme.desc: Superior Springfield rifles help scouts (Dennis Morgan, Richard Denning) and the cavalry get forts built in Wyoming.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: Rancher Lee Hackett (Van Heflin) spends so much time trying to keep the violent streak of his son Ed (Tab Hunter) in check, he neglects the needs of his other son Davy (James Darren). When Ed's temper results in the death of an innocent Native American, Lee tries his best to cover his son's tracks by making a deal with unscrupulous horse trader Jensen (Ray Teal), who falsely testifies on Ed's behalf. But it becomes clear that Ed can't change, and a shootout between father and son ensues.

programme.title: Fury at Gunsight Pass
programme.desc: One bank robber (David Brian) double-crosses another (Neville Brand), giving the undertaker and others a chance at the loot.

programme.title: The Rough, Tough West
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) looks for his friend Big Jack (Jack Mahoney) and finds out that Jack is illegally commandeering the mines and claims of others.

programme.title: The Doolins of Oklahoma
programme.desc: Old West outlaw Bill Doolin (Randolph Scott) marries a deacon's wife, but his gang will not leave him alone.

programme.title: The Outlaws Is Coming
programme.desc: Moe, Larry and Curly Joe (Adam West) bring their head-knocking, eye-gouging antics to the Wild West. When reporter Kenneth Cabot (Nancy Kovack) heads to Wyoming to stop the slaughter of buffaloes, he brings the stooges with him. There, they trade barbs with Billy the Kid, Jesse James and Wild Bill Hickock, while Cabot gets elected town sheriff. But they'll need some help from Annie Oakley (Mort Mills) when it comes to foiling the criminal plans of a land-hungry frontier villain.

programme.title: Alvarez Kelly
programme.desc: Alvarez Kelly (William Holden) is a Mexican cattle rancher who is doing his best to stay out of the Civil War. He has no interest in which side may win or lose -- Kelly is far more concerned about his own survival, and about making money. He soon finds himself in the middle of the conflict, however, when a confederate colonel (Richard Widmark) captures the rancher and forces Kelly to help his soldiers steal a nearby herd of cattle, which they desperately need for food.

programme.title: The Longest Drive
programme.desc: After a decade apart, a pair of brothers reunites to find their long-lost sister, who was kidnapped as a child and is now living with a native tribe.

programme.title: The Quick Gun
programme.desc: A banished gunfighter (Audie Murphy) returns to his sweetheart (Merry Anders) and helps his sheriff friend (James Best) face outlaws.

programme.title: Gunmen From Laredo
programme.desc: A framed Texas rancher (Robert Knapp) escapes from prison for a showdown with a saloonkeeper (Walter Coy).

programme.title: The Wild Westerners
programme.desc: A U.S. marshal (James Philbrook) and his wife (Nancy Kovack) bring Union gold east through outlaws and Indians.

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone
programme.desc: Journeying from Mexico back home to West Texas, mercenary Tom Buchanan (Randolph Scott) takes a break for the night in the border town of Agry. He soon discovers that almost every resident -- from the crooked sheriff (Barry Kelley) to the shifty-eyed innkeeper -- is a member of the prominent Agry family. When Buchanan defends Juan de la Vega (Manuel Rojas), a young man about to be lynched for shooting the town drunk, he himself is accused of murder and must struggle to escape town alive.

programme.title: King of the Wild Horses
programme.desc: A mustang stallion runs swiftly to the rescue when the boy who befriended him is endangered.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Four soldiers of fortune are hired by a wealthy rancher to rescue his beautiful young wife who has been kidnapped by a villainous Mexican bandit. When they finally find her, after fighting their way across deserts and mountains, they discover she is not being held against her will. This causes friction within the band as to whether they should honor their agreement.

programme.title: Blackjack Ketchum, Desperado
programme.desc: A gunfighter (Howard Duff) wants peace in the valley, but a cattle baron (Victor Jory) and his brothers want war.

programme.title: Gunfighters
programme.desc: Brazos Kane, a gunslinger who's vowed to kill no more, goes to work for a land baron on a ranch, where he is unjustly accused of murder.

programme.title: Land Raiders
programme.desc: An Arizona land-grabber (Telly Savalas) and his brother (George Maharis) renew their feud amid Army troops and Apaches.

programme.title: They Came to Cordura
programme.desc: On a mission to Mexico, U.S. Maj. Tom Thorn (Gary Cooper) is branded a coward, while several of his fellow servicemen are praised for showing bravery. Tom is asked to transport the heroes through harsh terrain so they can be honored. Also along for the journey is Adelaide Geary (Rita Hayworth), a woman charged with conspiring against the United States. But, as his fellow soldiers begin revealing their treacherous sides, Tom realizes that Adelaide is the only heroic one of the bunch.

programme.title: Face of a Fugitive
programme.desc: While being escorted to jail, bank robber Jim Larson (Fred MacMurray) manages to get the upper hand on his captor and escape. Jim is surprised to see his brother appear on the scene, ready to aid his sibling. As they make their getaway, his brother and the pursuing lawman shoot each other, leaving the stunned Jim alone and on the run. Assuming a different identity, Jim travels to a mining town and befriends the local sheriff (Lin McCarthy), hoping to start over and find redemption.

programme.title: Corrupt
programme.desc: A district attorney asks a forensic accountant (Nicole de Boer) to investigate the murder of a key witness.

programme.title: FBI: Negotiator
programme.desc: An FBI agent must negotiate with a woman holding a hospital hostage in order to get her hands on an experimental drug.

programme.title: Crimes Of The Mind
programme.desc: A woman spends five years trying to get her brainwashed daughter back from a cult.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A retired heavyweight trains a bullied kid how to fight. But declaring victory for the young boxer will mean overcoming his troubled past.

programme.title: The Soulmate Search
programme.desc: Lindsay and Will bond after agreeing the dating service that matched them has made a mistake.

programme.title: Accidentally In Love
programme.desc: Edie finds true love in London just days before she is to return to the US. They are separated, but as fate would have it, they reunite 6 years later.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori is hosting a 90210 themed party and wants to create some classic Beverly Hills appys.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori teams up with Josh Flagg to create a backyard summer camp-out with the Troop Beverly Hills theme.

programme.title: For the Love of Lily
programme.desc: A career-minded city girl must build a garden with a plant-loving country boy to appease her boss.

programme.title: Our Take on Love
programme.desc: A fashion designer and filmmaker unexpectedly find romance when they are brought together to plan a glamorous party at an old mansion.

programme.title: The PA and the Manhattan Prince
programme.desc: A personal assistant to the stars finds her heart entering precarious territory when her new royal employer arrives in New York for a masquerade ball.

programme.title: Mr. Pawsitively Perfect
programme.desc: When her favorite foster dog is adopted by a high-profile furniture designer, an aspiring marketing designer fears he's only trying to help his image.

programme.title: Love's Playlist
programme.desc: Music exec Amanda clashes with brand rep Sam at a launch party, unaware she already met him online.

programme.title: Romantic Friction
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a book cover artist posing as the author of a hit romance novel and the snooty writer who actually penned it under a pseudonym.

programme.title: Steal Your Heart
programme.desc: The accidental sale of an heirloom lands an amateur jeweler a position in Miami’s biggest jewelry company working alongside the CEO’s too-serious son.

programme.title: Driven Underground
programme.desc: A single mother with a gun stops at nothing to protect her daughter, a key witness in a mob murder case, after relocating the entire family to Oregon.

programme.title: Ties that Bind
programme.desc: Detective takes in her jailed brothers unruley teenagers whilst looking after her own and solving crime.

programme.title: Hunt for Truth
programme.desc: Carrie Evans, a beautiful young attorney with aspirations to become partner like her fiancee Steven Riggs, learns some disturbing facts about her family and her boss Caswell Foxx as she researches a big case.

programme.title: Law Of Attraction
programme.desc: A young attorney connects with a nice guy at a wedding and starts to have feelings for him but he turns out to be the opposing counsel.

programme.title: The Love Issue
programme.desc: A beauty editor finds a fake boyfriend when her ex-boyfriend (and boss) gets engaged.

programme.title: My Mother's Stalker
programme.desc: A single mother gets more than she bargained for, when she decides to spice up her life by meeting up with an obsessive old high school flame.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori throws her five year old son an epic spiderman birthday party!

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori is throwing a Christmas party in the middle of summer.

programme.title: Love's Fast Lane
programme.desc: A viral video brings a female mechanic fame and romance with a publicist who’s trying to make her a host on a popular car-enthusiast talk show.

programme.title: FBI: Negotiator
programme.desc: An FBI agent must negotiate with a woman holding a hospital hostage in order to get her hands on an experimental drug.

programme.title: Meet Me in New York
programme.desc: Events planner Kelly meets her match in web editor Joe when planning his niece's birthday party.

programme.title: Scented with Love
programme.desc: Paris-trained perfumer Rosalie is forced to share her new store space with furniture maker Jason.

programme.title: Loving Every Minute
programme.desc: A watch that sets back time by five minutes, messes with Stephanie and Hunter’s budding romance.

programme.title: Falling for the Manny
programme.desc: Alice is up for partner at her firm and hires her sister’s manny, Jacob, to help with her daughter.

programme.title: Accidentally In Love
programme.desc: Edie finds true love in London just days before she is to return to the US. They are separated, but as fate would have it, they reunite 6 years later.

programme.title: Text To Kill
programme.desc: Teens band together to investigate the source of anonymous messages that threaten to expose their secrets.

programme.title: Legend of Gatotkaca
programme.desc: After a superpowered assassin kills his best friend, Yuda uncovers a secret prophecy that will be key to surviving the battle against an ancient evil.

programme.title: Iron Protector
programme.desc: Wu-Lin leaves for the City of Stone-cold to protect the daughter of the richest family in the city.

programme.title: Sakra
programme.desc: After being accused of murder, a martial artist goes searching for answers about his origin story and the unknown enemies working to destroy him.

programme.title: Samurai Marathon
programme.desc: An aging lord challenges his samurai to a grueling marathon.

programme.title: Little Big Soldier
programme.desc: An old soldier kidnaps a young enemy general and takes him on a long journey to collect the reward.

programme.title: Debt Collectors
programme.desc: A martial artist becomes a mob debt collector, but easy money turns perilous as a client entangles him in an unforeseeable web of danger.

programme.title: Sword of Destiny
programme.desc: Twenty years after the murder of his father by the traitor Zhao Han, Meng Yang attempts to avenge him using the sacred Chengying Sword.

programme.desc: Bandit Pocky Zhang collides with con man Tang, sparking a deadly game to seize power.

programme.title: Paid In Blood
programme.desc: When a powerful gang constructs Asia’s largest casino, it is challenged by a vicious Seoul gangster who is more than eager to kill his way to the top.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: Phileas Fogg makes an incredible wager and embarks on a fantastic journey.

programme.title: The Unsinkable Molly Brown
programme.desc: A young woman and her husband strike it rich and become European celebrities, but after her Titanic survival, she becomes an international hero.

programme.title: It Happened on 5th Avenue
programme.desc: A hobo gets more company than usual one year amid his annual tradition of moving into a wealthy man's vacant New York mansion for the winter.

programme.title: The Americanization of Emily
programme.desc: A black comedy about honor, cowardice and unexpected heroism.

programme.title: Susan Slept Here
programme.desc: A screenwriter and his wife take in a juvenile delinquent during the Christmas holidays, and neither is prepared for the turmoil that will come.

programme.title: Dead Ringer
programme.desc: Envious of her sister, a woman kills and impersonates her sibling, only to encounter scrutiny from a watchful police sergeant and a cunning suitor.

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
programme.desc: An early 20th-century family faces an emotional upheaval when they must relocate from St. Louis to New York due to the father's job transfer.

programme.title: The Gathering
programme.desc: A terminally ill businessman reconnects with his estranged family for one last Christmas, with his illness kept secret from his now adult children.

programme.title: No Time for Sergeants
programme.desc: A naïve, stubborn farm boy joins the peacetime Air Force, defying attempts to mold him into a soldier and driving everyone around him crazy.

programme.title: On Moonlight Bay
programme.desc: After moving to Indiana, Marjorie Winfield begins a relationship with William Sherman, a young man who causes friction between her and her father.

programme.title: Room for One More
programme.desc: A good-hearted wife starts taking in homeless cats, dogs, and youngsters until there isn't room for one more.

programme.title: Bundle of Joy
programme.desc: After finding a baby on a doorstep, a department store clerk finds herself mistaken for its mother and must keep up the ruse to keep her job.

programme.title: The Nun's Story
programme.desc: A nun cannot maintain her vow of peace when Nazis murder her father.

programme.title: Bachelor Mother
programme.desc: After finding a baby on a doorstep, a single department store clerk finds herself forced by her employer to take care of the abandoned infant.

programme.title: The Band Wagon
programme.desc: When no film producer wants him, a Hollywood actor returns to the Broadway stage in a clash of egos with his ballerina co-star and catty director.

programme.title: Wonderful World of the Brothers Grimm, The
programme.desc: A biography of the German fairy tale collectors that follows the sacrifices they made to achieve their goals.

programme.title: Adam's Rib

programme.title: Cabaret
programme.desc: A carefree American singer, a British academic, and a wealthy baron become involved in a complicated love triangle as Nazism rises in 1931 Berlin.

programme.title: The Great Race
programme.desc: Set in 1908, dastardly, black-garbed Professor Fate dares the world's greatest hero, The Great Leslie, to race 22,000 miles from New York to Paris.

programme.title: Kiss Me Kate
programme.desc: Things become complicated for a divorced husband and wife when they both land leading roles in the same Shakespeare-based musical.

programme.title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
programme.desc: After the devastating attack on Pearl Harbor, Lieutenant Colonel Jimmy Doolittle devises a plan for a daring raid to strike Japan.

programme.title: Now, Voyager
programme.desc: After a rejuvenating visit to a sanitarium, Charlotte—who suffered for years under her domineering mother—falls in love with a married man.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth investigate the case of a mutilated body found on the roof of a federal building; Brennan hears from her long-lost father.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A body Brennan and Booth think is that of Brennan's incarcerated adversary, serial killer Howard Epps, is burned beyond recognition.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: After Booth's gun is taken away because he maliciously shot a clown ornament on an ice-cream truck, Brennan must go to Florida alone to investigate the death of a college student whose body is found inside an alligator.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Bancroft family calls on Brennan and Booth to investigate the stabbing death of Terence Bancroft; Agent Sullivan invites Brennan to his basketball game.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: During a murder investigation at the marina, Booth notices similarities between the case and a murder in Brennan's latest book.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth interrupts Brennan's vacation with her boyfriend (Eddie McClintock) to get help with the case of a woman whose boneless body was found in a river.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: When Toby sees a woman revive a badly injured baby, he becomes curious about her gift.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby uses his gift to help Detective Marks gather intelligence from the traumatized victim of a serial rapist.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: When the only witness to a double murder is unable to speak, Toby reads his mind to determine what happened.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby and Olivia learn that Oz's parents' restaurant is in trouble; Toby uses his telepathy to try to solve a missing persons case.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A murder victim's spirit won't leave Calleigh alone until she solves his case.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.desc: The team investigates its own department when Horatio's ex-girlfriend is killed in an explosion.

programme.desc: A serial killer leaves cryptic hints and dead bodies for the team.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team loses one of its own when a psychotic genius runs wild in Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a woman is murdered at an exclusive club, Horatio must search through an elite guest list to find the killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a girl is kidnapped, the only witness is a blind man who heard the abduction.

programme.desc: After helping a man get parole, Morgan regrets his decision when the man murders someone shortly after being released.

programme.title: Criminal Minds

programme.desc: The team must stop a gang of suspected murderers that is targeting a new victim nightly.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team must investigate targeted killings in Florida while each member is dealing with feelings about losing Prentiss.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A stalker in San Diego targets college students; Strauss scrutinizes the team after the loss of Prentiss.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team travels to a North Carolina town where one woman was found badly injured and another is missing, and discovers those may not be the only victims.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team investigates the murder of Patton's friend, a former Navy SEAL gunned down in a drive-by shooting while Patton watched.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A Navy lieutenant from a well-connected and affluent family has a fatal fall down a flight of stairs at a charity gala; the team investigates whether his death was an accident or foul play.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When Elvis Bertrand's "daughter" is linked to a murder case, he asks Pride to prove her innocence.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Tammy is convinced that a con man committed the hit-and-run murder of a Navy doctor, even though the evidence shows otherwise; unbeknownst to Hannah, her husband approaches Pride with new intel on an underground spy network.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team investigates a deadly bombing at a military museum event with over 1,000 people in attendance.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride and Lasalle travel to war-torn South Ossetia to locate an FBI agent who was kidnapped during a failed mission to apprehend the leader of Apollyon, the underground spy network responsible for murdering Pride's father.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After tracking Apollyon, a deadly underground spy network, to war-torn South Ossetia, Pride is separated from the team and faces grave danger; in order to save Pride, the NCIS team must locate a mole who continues to feed information to Apollyon.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride must cut his vacation short when Hannah is suspended for breaking protocol during a joint investigation with the FBI.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth suspect bullying as a factor in the death of a private high school student.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: With 48 hours until Alex Rockwell is executed, the team races to prove Brennan's suspicion that he didn't commit the murders of which he was convicted.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a member of the Iranian parliament kidnaps Arastoo to have him help with a murder case, the team races to identify the killer; Brennan turns to Aubrey for help when she learns the truth about Booth's gambling.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A well-known cookie jar collector's corpse is discovered in a riverbank; Booth struggles with Brennan's decision; Aubrey is interested in one of the "squinterns."

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team must navigate the two very different worlds while investigating the death of an ex-con turned yoga instructor; Booth works to regain Brennan's trust; Angela and Hodgins make a major decision.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team investigates a killing in which the crime scene points to a possible protege of Pelant; Angela second-guesses the decision to move to Paris; Brennan and Booth consider employment options.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Six months after starting a new life with her family, Brennan becomes interested in a case to which she has personal ties; an FBI investigation begins when Booth goes missing.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth's location and condition becomes more mysterious when it's discovered that FBI Agent Miller (Kim Raver) has been hiding vital information; Arastoo makes a significant decision.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When Brennan officially returns to work at the Jeffersonian and Booth resumes his position at the FBI, remains are found at a fish farm; Hodgins encourages Angela to exhibit her photography work; Cam faces a difficult decision.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan enlists the help of a fellow forensic anthropologist in the investigation into the death of a real estate agent whose remains appear to have been destroyed by coyote-wolf hybrids.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the boss of Calder's Biscuit Company is murdered in Copenhagen, Barnaby and Nelson join forces with two female Danish detectives, the abrasive and astute Poulsen and the charming and cool Degn. They discover Eric Calder had more linking him to Copenhagen than just his famous Golden Clusters.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As the Barnabys prepare for Cully's wedding, Lord Fitzroy and Beth Porteous are married in the pretty village of Bledlow. At the lavish reception at Bledlow Hall that follows, however, tragedy strikes - maid of honour Marina Fellowes is found murdered in one of the rooms by some of the guests. With their honeymoon cancelled, the Fitzroys must contend with a police presence in their home, as Barnaby and Jones try to learn more about the family history. It soon becomes clear there are secrets, deception, and an illegtimate son involved in the mystery, which is further complicated when the estate manager is killed by an arrow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's a good day for the Hicks family, as the name of Tommy Hicks - who was executed during World War I for "cowardice and desertion" - is added to the list on Midsomer Parva's war memorial. Tommy's son Lionel and grandson Dave, mayor of Causton and whom Barnaby does not like (owing to dodgy building work by the mayor's company), are thrilled, but the snooty Hammonds are decidedly less pleased. Henry, the patriarch of the Hammond family, is particularly riled by his insalubrious neighbours, and has nurtured a long-running feud with the Hickses. But the evening after a battle re-enactment in the village, Henry is murdered - and Barnaby must delve into the history of the two families to find the killer, discovering a web of fraud, lies, and hidden truths.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are in Dunstan to investigate the deaths of a reclusive couple. As they try to establish whether Ron and Libby Wilson were murdered or died of natural causes, their attention is drawn to a dispute raging between a local builder and road protesters nearby. When another death occurs, the detectives learn that there are plenty of dark secrets and fierce hostilities in this apparently idyllic village. Will Jack Purdy's quick temper lead to violence? How far would the protesters go to prevent the bypass being built? And do current events somehow relate to the death of Michael Wilson many years earlier?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the body of Londoner Charlie Finleyson is discovered in woodland near Midsomer Sonning, Barnaby and Jones find themselves investigating employees at local Midsomer Life magazine. It turns out the dead man was married to the ex-wife of Guy Sandys, the wealthy owner of the publication. As the detectives become aware of a feud between Guy and the proprietor of the Morecroft Hotel, tensions are also heating up between the locals and visiting Londoners. Soon Barnaby and Jones find themselves to trying to piece together the truth about the murder, and learn that someone might be trying to conceal something in their past.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a pub landlady is crushed to death during a magic show in Midsomer Oaks, Barnaby and Nelson uncover conflict between the village church and ancient pagan traditions. Is famous magician Gideon Latimer to blame or is he the target?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are forced to take part in a team building exercise and Tom has plenty of problems dealing with the young, new, acting Chief Superintendent, John Cotton (Nick Fletcher). Following an explosion in a truck that had been stored in a truck depot, a body is soon discovered in a nearby lake, which turns out to be Alec Grainger, who had been seen arguing with James Parkes (Joseph Millson), the son of Colonel Matt Parkes (Tim Pigott-Smith). James appears to be involved in shady business deals and is blamed by his grandmother Caroline Halsey (Judy Parfitt) - and others - for the suicide of a woman he got pregnant two years before. Barnaby and Jones find themselves delving into a mixture of fraud, smuggling, and lies, trying to piece together the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When two couples vanish into thin air in the village of Monks Barton, Barnaby and Jones hear rumours of haunted woods and witchcraft. Barnaby remains sceptical of this, even when an unidentified body is found in a shallow grave and the missing start turning up dead. He soon has to determine if ghosts, criminals, or something else, is behind the abductions and murders.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Villagers of Midsomer Barton are all set to celebrate Oak Apple Week, especially as the carnival queen event is set to return after an eight year absence. Yet the body of the mother of a deceased, one-time carnival queen, found in a stream, looks set to spoil things, as Barnaby and Jones find themselves digging up the past. From familiar faces, to drunken boasts and hidden obessions, it slowly becomes clear that the mother's daughter might be the key to solving the murder, when more deaths follow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Wealthy, eccentric and obese aristocrat Freddy Butler drops dead, shortly after gathering all three of his wives at Haddington Hall to make an announcement. Although George Bullard is adamant his death is from natural causes, the case is far from simple when Freddy's solicitor is deliberately killed in a house fire shortly afterwards and Freddy's will goes missing. Barnaby and Jones find themselves investigating the extended Butler family, uncovering hidden secrets, illegitimate children and elusive treasure in the process.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Martin Barrett, a local council clerk living in Midsomer Worthy, is murdered during the night by shotgun, prompting Barnaby and Jones to find a motive for his murder. When they discover that Barrett was an expert blackmailer, his victims become prime suspects for his death - from a local pub landlord, a cleaner, a prominent member of the police board, to a former marine geologist. As they investigate, finding themselves drawn to the seaside, they slowly uncover deception, theft, attempted blackmail and hatred.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the village of Broughton, a ninety-year-old battle of the sexes has often occurred, with men trying to oppose an event that the women have managed to successfully hold without interruption, until it culminates with casualties on both sides - Mildred Danvers, an elderly woman who had returned on the day of a funeral and poisoned in her hotel room, and Rev. Anthony Gant, shot during a major event being held in the village green, in view of many. It soon becomes clear someone may have wished to kill both to cover up a dark truth, and soon Barnaby has to figure out who amongst the village wanted both dead, complicated further when Gant's curate is murdered next.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Villagers in Elverton-cum-Latterly are up in arms and divided, over the building of a supermarket. Things soon come to a head when independent environmental supervisor, Frank Hopkirk, is found stabbed to death at a Jubb's Timber Yard, the site of the new supermarket, by a pair of children. When Barnaby and Jones investigate to determine who wanted Hopkirk dead, they find out that he secretly came to the village under various aliases for sexual rendezvous with various women in fantasy role-playing scenarios, and that he had been making further investigations on the future development site and having doubts over claims it was contaminated. Either someone didn't like his investigations, or someone didn't like his sexual appetite, but either way, Barnaby finds himself investigating lies and more to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and DC Ben Jones (Jason Hughes) find themselves attempting to unravel the deaths of a choir tenor, and later a bird watcher, before more murders occur. The case is complicated by a rivalry between the Midsomer Worthy and Aston Wherry choirs, due to compete in an upcoming competition, and suspicions that an art scam is to be conducted, and soon Barnaby and Jones become concerned about a local woman, who they fear may become a victim herself. Particularly when it becomes clear the bird watcher had been photographing suspicious activity of late.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A few months ago, Annie Woodrow was arrested, accused of murdering her friend, Frances Trevelyan, on the motive of wanting Frances' husband. Her time in court has come, but DCI Barnaby is certain she still is holding things back in regards to the murder, and decides to monitor the trial. Yet a chance remark by Frances' youngest daughter, and a meeting with an old friend and psychiatrist, makes him begin to doubt the evidence for her conviction. Soon he and DC Jones, awaiting news of his promotion to DS, find themselves reinvestigating the case, and it soon becomes clear that they may have missed details that could implicate another in the murder.

programme.title: Super Sleuths - Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Midsomer Murders team opens up about their experience of working on the popular crime drama and provides insight into the overall process of bringing it to the small screen.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's Christmas and new detective Charlie Nelson moves into Midsomer. He's thrown straight into an intriguing mystery in the village of Morton Shallows. A man is fatally stabbed with an antique sword during a ghost-hunting party at a "haunted" manor house. Can Barnaby and Nelson find a more earthly motive behind the murder and trap the killer?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A series of murders in Midsomer St Claire seem to be inspired by macabre images on a medieval fresco recently discovered in the church crypt. As the village prepares for storms and flooding it appears that someone is using ancient torture methods to punish modern-day "sinners". But who is responsible and why?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When wealthy farmer Martin Strickland is covered in truffle oil and mauled to death by a wild boar, the investigation leads to restaurant Wyvern House and its tyrannical celebrity chef Ruth Cameron. Secrets from the past surface and the killer strikes again - but the poison spreads wider than its intended target.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a body is discovered in a reservoir dropped out of a plane, Barnaby and Nelson find the world of stunt pilots and military heroes hides many dark secrets. Are campaigners against the local airfield behind Bernard King's murder or does it link back to a tragic story from World War Two?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the boss of Calder's Biscuit Company is murdered in Copenhagen, Barnaby and Nelson join forces with two female Danish detectives, the abrasive and astute Poulsen and the charming and cool Degn. programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The unveiling of a newly-discovered novel by deceased Midsomer crime-writer George Summersbee at the Luxton Deeping Crime Festival is jeopardised when the manuscript is stolen and a woman is fatally electrocuted by a booby-trapped roulette wheel. Can new dad Barnaby untangle a web of jealousy and obsession to find the killer?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a pub landlady is crushed to death during a magic show in Midsomer Oaks, Barnaby and Nelson uncover conflict between the village church and ancient pagan traditions. Is famous magician Gideon Latimer to blame or is he the target?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Could a ballad made famous by late, lamented folk singer Johnny Carver be an inspiration for murder? Did someone want to kill Toby Winning for threatening to take the Little Crosby Folk Festival away from Midsomer - or is the true motive something hidden for 20 years?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The fizz goes out of a sparkling wine launch when the glasses are laced with slug poison. Who is targeting the Midsomer Vinae Winery and what does the attack have to do with the death of a child in a hit-and-run accident?

programme.desc: Kalu Yala CEO, Jimmy Stice, welcomes the interns and they learn the lay of the land. While he attends Hatch, an innovation conference in Montana, a student revolt breaks out.

programme.title: Jungletown
programme.desc: Interns challenge the purpose of their new community--are they doing more harm than good? Where is their money going?

programme.title: Jungletown
programme.desc: Jimmy shows off his jungle playground, but is challenged by interns worried about their environmental impact.

programme.desc: During inspiration week, the interns go wild while Ryan attempts to hike 100 miles on a pilgrimage to the Cristo Negro festival as the company deals with fleeing interns.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The landscape in the battle for winter roads supremacy is shaken to the core as Art Burke locks horns with VP Express bosses Hugh Rowland and Vlad Plescott.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: When a Haul Road legend dies, Ray leads the trucker's son to scatter his ashes on Atigun.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Dalton rookie Ray Veilleux drives into a trucker's worst nightmare when he's distracted for a split-second.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: After just two days in the Arctic, the critical demands of the oil exploration sites are testing the limits of the truckers and their machines.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Warming temperatures are causing overflows all over the ice road, and with water rushing through cracks in the ice, hauling loads just got a lot more dangerous.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Hugh and Eric are neck-in-neck in their race to claim dominance over the ice road, but with only days before the end of the season.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny has no interest in a rubber-to-roof restoration on a `73 Chevy Blazer until he hears that it's a tribute to the owner's nephew.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Kevin and Roli make an unplanned stop to check out a mysteriously small vehicle. And later, Danny gets a call from Rob Zombie who wants to customize a truck for his upcoming tour.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny can't stop buying cars. Soon after striking a deal on Gordon's '73 Mustang, he finds an enormous FMC Motorhome.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny helps Shannon restore an old VW van and later finds a `69 Ford Bronco for a single mom who wants to revisit her youth with her son.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny lets painter Ryan take the lead on a 1959 Chevy Panel Truck project he hopes to flip, and later motivates his crew to clean up the shop.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Country rocker Andy Ross wants Danny to build the world's most patriotic muscle car ever made. Will a Second Amendment-inspired hot rod Corvette do the trick?

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny impulsively buys a '69 Caddy and falls madly in love with her. Will he sell it for a big profit, or add her to his collection?

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny buys a '78 Lincoln with some serious fire damage, but it's only when he takes it apart does he learn how bad it is.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: The shop finally gets to work on Danny's famous '71 Super Fly Cadillac, but Kevin isn't feeling the love. Later, Grandpa wins big at poker but blows a deal for a new motorcycle.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny turns a 1967 GTO into a world class muscle car and hopes for a monstrous flip. Later, Mike and Roli get in a sticky situation and Danny tries to buy a classic Mercury.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: The Count takes a chance by building a low-rider with a Count's Kustoms twist. Will the local aficionados embrace Danny's car, or kick it to the curb?

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Kevin disapproves of how much money Danny is spending tricking out his dream FMC Motorhome, but Danny has a surprise plan to help him get over it.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Ziggy Marley meets Danny at Vamp'd to commission a restoration on his father, Bob Marley's, vintage Mercedes.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck as the shop rushes to finish restoring the last car Bob Marley ever owned. They must hustle to deliver it to Ziggy Marley in LA while Horny Mike takes on a dangerous side project with teeth.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Gabe has to call upon his son Aidan to step up and fill the family shoes; an overcrowded landing means one wrong move could wipe out the Papac crew below; Greg's quest to find the Lost Log Train is back on track.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: In Washington, production's rising with the newest generation of Rygaard on the job; David Zitterkopf is back in action with his son Levi to take on their biggest; Papac's new unit puts the crew to the ultimate test.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The Rygaard crew gets a surprise visit from logging legend Craig Rygaard; the Zitterkopfs face a major obstacle in their push to complete their largest ever job; Papac battles the Longest Yard unit with its mile long skyline.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Rygaard Logging is trying to get back on track with the help of patriarch Craig Rygaard; the Swampman's under the gun to build an emergency treetop storm shelter; David Zitterkopf's son Levi gets a crucial lesson in logging.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Gabe Rygaard pushes his crew to a breaking point; Gary and Eddie blow up their business to cash in on green gold; David Zitterkopf could see his family empire fall to pieces, with one wrong move; a mutiny is underway among the Chapman crew.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: As Papac Alaska goes deeper into their seven thousand acre site, Joe and Coatsy devise a plan of attack for the next section of this massive project; Rygaard Logging is fighting to get the wood out; Gary and Eddie need to step up their game.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The Papac crew is moving on to the most remote and treacherous site of their season; the money is drying up for Greg Chapman and his crew is seeing red; Gary and Eddie's new venture is becoming a nightmare.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Mike Papac has to step in as Joe and Coatsey's arguments threaten to bring the job to a grinding halt; David Zitterkopf's back to work after an injury that threatened to end his season.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: A storm's brewing over the Swamp Man and it's threatening to wash away his hopes of filling a huge order; Gabe deals with the aftermath of Aiden's mutiny; the Chapman crew's behind after they burned through their money chasing the Lost Logging Train.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: In Washington, three generations of Rygaard loggers are fighting for the crown; Papack Alaska Logging moves into their final section; Gary and Eddie see if their swamp logging gamble has paid off.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers head to Ft. Worth, Texas in search of western collectables and old heirlooms. Ricky and Bubba bring a legendary cowboy for some celebrity help. Victor Rjesnjansky tries to make peace with the locals.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers head to a high-end facility in Lake Highlands, Texas. Lesa Lewis battles against retired NFL star, Roy Williams, for a locker with a dark item. Victor Rjesnjansky hunts for the key to a padlocked treasure chest.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Lewisville, Texas is known for its glittering lakes and well-to-do residence--meaning it's the perfect place for the buyers to strike it rich. Victor and Lesa duke it out for a locker with a player piano.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The Storage Stampede hits the Dallas metroplex with back-to-back auctions. If the buyers can't keep up with the crowd, they risk missing a locker of a lifetime. Ricky and Bubba enlist a fisherman's strategy.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: In the refined country town of Tyler, Texas--the hunt begins for rare art and designer furniture. A tantrum from Lesa Lewis forces Jerry to carry the weight of the team.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers have a big decision to make: go to an auction with safe "bread and butter" lockers or risk it all at an auction in a developing neighborhood. The claws come out, when Lesa battles with a hot young buyer. Ricky and Bubba find a collection of antique gunslingers toys.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers journey to the resort and spa town of Mineral Wells. "Rangers" Ricky and Bubba face off with Victor for a luxury household locker. New buyer Jenny Grumbles tries to exterminate two pests: a swarm of termites and a lovesick buyer. "The Outsider" takes some old wood to an old friend. And a classic lighter sparks up a fortune. With a massive payout at stake, the buyers will have to learn that big things often come in small packages.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers travel to the transportation hub of Irving, TX. Dr. Moe's prot g e, Mary Padian, returns -- giving refurbisher, Jenny Grumbles, a run for her money. Ricky Smith learns a valuable lesson in human anatomy. Victor Rjesnjansky buys a secret agent's locker. And Bubba Smith is forced to find a buyer for some explicit art. Dr. Moe once said, "Mary's imagination really blows my socks off!" As the buyers are about to discover -- her mind is far stranger than expected.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Lisa returns to Moreno Valley, where it all started, and gets nostalgic with her locker; Kenny welcomes a new granddaughter to the clan and would love to find an appropriate unit; Dusty and Lupe put a little elbow grease into their purchase.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy takes on a supervisory role in Stanton, and it leads him to a bit of Slavic success; Brandi tries to help Danielle outfit her new apartment; Lisa gambles on a painting.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dusty and Lupe pedal their way to an auction but end up needing the truck; Darrell pins his hopes on a small locker for which he overpaid; Rene makes the most of the honeymoon unit, and things get a bit racy.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Back in Montebello, Gunter comes along to help Rene, who won't give him the time of day; Darrell tries to make Kimber his queen; Ivy and his boys Rochambeau their way to solid showing.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Kenny makes his way out to the mountains, watching out for cougars the whole time; Lisa scores on a small sister locker, but it's Brandi who gets the nomination for buyer of the week.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy kidnaps Pops and takes him to Rosamond, where they deftly score a fine locker; Kenny sets out to brighten everyone's day and his clowning around has him seeing stars; Lisa proves she has a friend... for now.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Kenny happens upon a familiar vehicle and follows it all the way to Lancaster for an auction; Rene tries to find new luck, after losing in Vegas; Lisa tries to make up for last time; the Calvins look to a higher power for their profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy ropes his kids into a beach day in Victorville and they make the best of it; Brandi tries to erase bad camping memories with a good locker; despite Rene giving him a hard time for his choices, Kenny manages to scrape out a decent return.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Laura's on her own in Moreno Valley, and she's anything but discreet about the reasons; Brandi cooks up a nice profit; Rene's doll locker yields a couple surprises, while Ivy dabbles with a bit of the supernatural.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy and Pops shop for bags in Fullerton but end up with containers; Darrell and Kimber go all in on a toy locker, while Brandi covers her costs in an otherwise unassuming household unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rene shows up to West Covina feeling very nostalgic; Kenny zeroes in a tricycle locker and deals with what's inside; the Calvins just try to have a fun day, while Barry can't understand the general lack of professionalism among his peers.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Lisa heads to Huntington Beach; Darrell spends the right amount of time going through his locker; Kenny rides a recent string of luck right into his unit, while Rene puts his bankroll up against a pair of safes.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Recently separated, Brandi and Jarrod find themselves at the same auction, and tensions flare; she gets the Laura treatment, and he regresses to his childhood self; Ivy schools Ivy Jr., who needs to find his footing.

programme.desc: Lewisville, Texas is known for its glittering lakes and well-to-do residence--meaning it's the perfect place for the buyers to strike it rich. Victor and Lesa duke it out for a locker with a player piano.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The Storage Stampede hits the Dallas metroplex with back-to-back auctions. If the buyers can't keep up with the crowd, they risk missing a locker of a lifetime. Ricky and Bubba enlist a fisherman's strategy.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: In the refined country town of Tyler, Texas--the hunt begins for rare art and designer furniture. A tantrum from Lesa Lewis forces Jerry to carry the weight of the team.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers have a big decision to make: go to an auction with safe "bread and butter" lockers or risk it all at an auction in a developing neighborhood. The claws come out, when Lesa battles with a hot young buyer. Ricky and Bubba find a collection of antique gunslingers toys.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers journey to the resort and spa town of Mineral Wells. "Rangers" Ricky and Bubba face off with Victor for a luxury household locker. New buyer Jenny Grumbles tries to exterminate two pests: a swarm of termites and a lovesick buyer. "The Outsider" takes some old wood to an old friend. And a classic lighter sparks up a fortune. With a massive payout at stake, the buyers will have to learn that big things often come in small packages.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers travel to the transportation hub of Irving, TX. Dr. Moe's prot g e, Mary Padian, returns -- giving refurbisher, Jenny Grumbles, a run for her money. Ricky Smith learns a valuable lesson in human anatomy. Victor Rjesnjansky buys a secret agent's locker. And Bubba Smith is forced to find a buyer for some explicit art. Dr. Moe once said, "Mary's imagination really blows my socks off!" As the buyers are about to discover -- her mind is far stranger than expected.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Lisa returns to Moreno Valley, where it all started, and gets nostalgic with her locker; Kenny welcomes a new granddaughter to the clan and would love to find an appropriate unit; Dusty and Lupe put a little elbow grease into their purchase.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy takes on a supervisory role in Stanton, and it leads him to a bit of Slavic success; Brandi tries to help Danielle outfit her new apartment; Lisa gambles on a painting.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dusty and Lupe pedal their way to an auction but end up needing the truck; Darrell pins his hopes on a small locker for which he overpaid; Rene makes the most of the honeymoon unit, and things get a bit racy.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Back in Montebello, Gunter comes along to help Rene, who won't give him the time of day; Darrell tries to make Kimber his queen; Ivy and his boys Rochambeau their way to solid showing.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Kenny makes his way out to the mountains, watching out for cougars the whole time; Lisa scores on a small sister locker, but it's Brandi who gets the nomination for buyer of the week.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy kidnaps Pops and takes him to Rosamond, where they deftly score a fine locker; Kenny sets out to brighten everyone's day and his clowning around has him seeing stars; Lisa proves she has a friend... for now.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Kenny happens upon a familiar vehicle and follows it all the way to Lancaster for an auction; Rene tries to find new luck, after losing in Vegas; Lisa tries to make up for last time; the Calvins look to a higher power for their profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy ropes his kids into a beach day in Victorville and they make the best of it; Brandi tries to erase bad camping memories with a good locker; despite Rene giving him a hard time for his choices, Kenny manages to scrape out a decent return.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Laura's on her own in Moreno Valley, and she's anything but discreet about the reasons; Brandi cooks up a nice profit; Rene's doll locker yields a couple surprises, while Ivy dabbles with a bit of the supernatural.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy and Pops shop for bags in Fullerton but end up with containers; Darrell and Kimber go all in on a toy locker, while Brandi covers her costs in an otherwise unassuming household unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rene shows up to West Covina feeling very nostalgic; Kenny zeroes in a tricycle locker and deals with what's inside; the Calvins just try to have a fun day, while Barry can't understand the general lack of professionalism among his peers.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Lisa heads to Huntington Beach; Darrell spends the right amount of time going through his locker; Kenny rides a recent string of luck right into his unit, while Rene puts his bankroll up against a pair of safes.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Recently separated, Brandi and Jarrod find themselves at the same auction, and tensions flare; she gets the Laura treatment, and he regresses to his childhood self; Ivy schools Ivy Jr., who needs to find his footing.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty,

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Phil, Willie and Ms. Kay attempt to produce a cooking video for their fans.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Phil decides to teach his grandkids the value of a hard day's work by building a football field and culminating in a family football game. But Robertson vs. Robertson competition is further sparked.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After a big order comes in Willie pushes the Duck Commander team to meet the tight deadline, so Jase and the warehouse guys come up with a plan to build a conveyer belt.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Brotherly competition gets the best of Willie when he ditches his kids' career day to go play golf with Jase. Stepping in for Willie, Phil and Si show up at the school and become the teachers' worst nightmare.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After blowing up one of Phil's dangerously antiquated duck blinds, the Robertson boys hatch a wild plan to build a luxury duck blind in the sky. Meanwhile, Ms. Kay and the Robertson women hold a yard sale.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase feels being COO of Duck Commander entitles him to a new office. But when Willie refuses, Jase hatches a plan to build one anyhow. Willie takes Miss Kay and the grandkids to the petting zoo.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift. (Surprise performance from ZZ Top!)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty,

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Phil, Willie and Ms. Kay attempt to produce a cooking video for their fans.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Phil decides to teach his grandkids the value of a hard day's work by building a football field and culminating in a family football game. But Robertson vs. Robertson competition is further sparked.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After a big order comes in Willie pushes the Duck Commander team to meet the tight deadline, so Jase and the warehouse guys come up with a plan to build a conveyer belt.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After blowing up one of Phil's dangerously antiquated duck blinds, the Robertson boys hatch a wild plan to build a luxury duck blind in the sky. Meanwhile, Ms. Kay and the Robertson women hold a yard sale.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase feels being COO of Duck Commander entitles him to a new office. But when Willie refuses, Jase hatches a plan to build one anyhow. Willie takes Miss Kay and the grandkids to the petting zoo.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's duck blind maintenance time again and the boys have discovered the waterline is low. At the levee, they realize this is the work of Phil's bucktoothed arch nemesis...THE BEAVER.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's the 40-year anniversary of Duck Commander and this celebration is a redneck Robertson style shindig. To top off the event, Willie decides to construct the world's largest duck call to be revealed at the party.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: To prove once and for all who rules the river AND the boardroom, Willie and Jase revive their childhood rivalry and go head-to-head in a fishing competition with the added challenge of having to sell their catch.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: While out duck hunting, Willie, Jase, and Uncle Si stumble across what redneck's consider nature's most prized succulent treasure--a beehive dripping with wild honey.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie finds out that his daughter Sadie has a new boyfriend, he wants to get to know him, while instilling some fatherly fear--Robertson style.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie decides to expand the Duck Commander brand into the winemaking industry and buys a vineyard...sight unseen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase volunteers to take the Duck Commander RV out on pick up, but neglects to mention to Willie, he's taking Si, Martin and Jep along for a road trip.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase and Si embark on a turkey hunt for the annual Robertson men vs. Robertson women cook-off to create a feast of fresh wild game. With Phil's discerning palate as judge, the teams pull out all of the stops.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When a big business decision must be made affecting Duck Commander, Willie plans an employee retreat.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old fashion race... at the local lawn mower competition. But Willie and the guys soon find out that this sport is nothing short of high octane.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: With Sadie's (Willie's daughter) driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After Willie's son (John Luke) leaves Willie's pickup in the driveway with a bone-dry gas tank, Willie and Korie decide that it's time to get the kid his own car.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Duck Commander assembly room gets an unexpected shakeup when a disgruntled Si decides to quit his job. But when Willie hires a replacement that clashes with the duck call room, Jase and the guys quickly become equally miserable at work. Meanwhile, Si turns to Phil for work out on the land turning a routine levee repair into a complete disaster.

programme.desc: With Sadie's (Willie's daughter) driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After Willie's son (John Luke) leaves Willie's pickup in the driveway with a bone-dry gas tank, Willie and Korie decide that it's time to get the kid his own car.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Duck Commander assembly room gets an unexpected shakeup when a disgruntled Si decides to quit his job. But when Willie hires a replacement that clashes with the duck call room, Jase and the guys quickly become equally miserable at work. Meanwhile, Si turns to Phil for work out on the land turning a routine levee repair into a complete disaster.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's duck blind maintenance time again and the boys have discovered the waterline is low. At the levee, they realize this is the work of Phil's bucktoothed arch nemesis...THE BEAVER.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's the 40-year anniversary of Duck Commander and this celebration is a redneck Robertson style shindig. To top off the event, Willie decides to construct the world's largest duck call to be revealed at the party.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: To prove once and for all who rules the river AND the boardroom, Willie and Jase revive their childhood rivalry and go head-to-head in a fishing competition with the added challenge of having to sell their catch.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: While out duck hunting, Willie, Jase, and Uncle Si stumble across what redneck's consider nature's most prized succulent treasure--a beehive dripping with wild honey.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie finds out that his daughter Sadie has a new boyfriend, he wants to get to know him, while instilling some fatherly fear--Robertson style.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie decides to expand the Duck Commander brand into the winemaking industry and buys a vineyard...sight unseen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase volunteers to take the Duck Commander RV out on pick up, but neglects to mention to Willie, he's taking Si, Martin and Jep along for a road trip.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase and Si embark on a turkey hunt for the annual Robertson men vs. Robertson women cook-off to create a feast of fresh wild game. With Phil's discerning palate as judge, the teams pull out all of the stops.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When a big business decision must be made affecting Duck Commander, Willie plans an employee retreat.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old fashion race... at the local lawn mower competition. But Willie and the guys soon find out that this sport is nothing short of high octane.

Meanwhile, Si turns to Phil for work out on the land turning a routine levee repair into a complete disaster.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie finds his office in shambles and alerts the authorities that the warehouse has had a break in. But soon Willie discovers that the culprit was his brother Jase, who needed supplies for an early morning frog hunt.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When a heat wave envelops West Monroe the air conditioning unit at the Duck Commander warehouse goes down, turning the duck call assembly room into a boiling sweatshop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After Korie decides the junk piles in the Duck Commander warehouse are beginning to reach critical mass, she calls on Willie and the guys to do a little company spring-cleaning. But the discovery of an old Ping-Pong table deep within the clutter quickly turns the chore into an all day table tennis tournament. Meanwhile, Uncle Si realizes that he's many years overdue for an appointment with the local eye doctor and ventures out for some new glasses.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own. When the station gives him the opportunity, Willie makes the mistake of bringing Uncle Si on the air with him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver. But too much enthusiasm about the celebrity's mode of transportation turns into a drag race showdown between Willie and Clint. Phil and Si have their hands full fixing Ms. Kay's barbecue when a trip to the outdoor grill store turns disastrous.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's Willie's turn to play Santa Claus at the local church this year but Uncle Si crashes the party and the event goes south in a hurry. Meanwhile, the family gathers at Phil and Miss Kay's house to celebrate the holidays in true redneck fashion.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before... including Willie.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: A compilation of the best scenes from all 11 seasons of A&E's hit series Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition
programme.desc: In this mother of all competition series, a dozen of the country's most talented kid dancers compete in weekly dance challenges. Twelve kids and their moms will move into a mansion and the kids will perform a new routine each week while the moms manage and oversee them. Will the moms get in the way of their child's success and cost them the chance of winning? Each week, someone is eliminated, narrowing down the field to see who will become the top dancer. The winner will receive a cash prize of $100,000 and a scholarship for full tuition to The Joffrey Ballet School. Dance Mom instructor Abby Lee Miller serves as one of the judges.

programme.title: Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition
programme.desc: When this life-changing competition kicks off the 12 finalists are tasked with their first live performance in front of judges including, Dance Moms Abby Lee Miller, Robin Antin, founder of the Pussycat Doll s dance troupe and celebrity choreographer, Richard "Richy" Jackson. The dancers are split into trios and assigned routines with a "Hollywood" theme. As the contestants prepare throughout the week, the moms start sizing each other up. Alliances begin to form, but when one mom takes charge during rehearsal, the other moms realize that she could be trouble. Plus, one mother and daughter team reveal just how far they re willing to go to win the competition.

programme.title: Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition
programme.desc: There are 11 dancers left and the theme for this week's competition is "Monsters of the Night." The theme proves to be very fitting as one mom bares her claws and strikes at another, who is using her divorce as a way to get attention. After witnessing that mom make one of the girls break into tears, two of the other mothers join forces and conjure up a demon, unleashing on the other mom claiming she is being fake. Also one of the girls wins the group dance challenge and gets a solo, but there must be a full moon because she brings out the beast in her mother who refuses to listen to her daughter's suggestions.
